CustomField.description: Average rating given when asked the question "On a scale of 1-5 (1=poor / 5 = excellent) please rate the value of the webinar to you." (Divide the sum of the ratings by the count of how many people rated)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Average rating given when asked the question "On a scale of 1-5 (1=poor / 5 = excellent) please rate the value of the webinar to you."
CustomField.label: On24 Webinar Rating (avg)
